name: Boost IT Security with Security-as-a
short_description: Small to mid-sized businesses (SMBs) need IT security like everyone else, but their needs and staff sizes don’t often permit in-house management. The U.S. House of Representatives Small Business Subcommittee on Health and Technology reports that 60% of small businesses that experience a cyber attack will close within 6 months. SMBs typically lack the budget, expertise, and time to manage the increasing demands of IT security, making managed IT security services a growing market.
summary: Small to mid-sized businesses (SMBs) need IT security like everyone
